sentence: The water in the glass is cold.
The cold wind made my face numb.
We slept in a cold room last night.
I keep the juice cold in the fridge.
My hands are cold after the walk.
The metal bar feels cold to the touch.
She drank cold tea with breakfast.
The soup turned cold on the table.
The cold rain soaked our jackets.
This morning was cold and foggy.
His cold reply ended the conversation.
She gave me a cold look and walked away.
The manager made a cold decision without discussion.
Their cold silence made everyone uncomfortable.
He sounded cold during the phone call.
The report uses a cold tone to describe the tragedy.
Her cold behavior confused her friends.
The team received a cold welcome at the meeting.
He remained cold even when others were excited.
A cold attitude can ruin a friendship.
The weather is hot today.
The sand is hot under my feet.
The tea is hot so wait a minute.
The soup stayed hot in the pot.
The oven is hot so be careful.
My face feels hot after running.
The shower water is hot in the morning.
The plate is hot from the microwave.
The city becomes hot in July.
The air is hot and dry in the afternoon.
This is a hot topic in the news.
The manager has a hot temper today.
The company made a hot offer to attract clients.
The debate became hot after that comment.
The journalist shared a hot rumor online.
She is a hot candidate for the award.
The team is on a hot streak this week.
Investors watch the hot market closely.
Police followed a hot lead in the case.
He brought a hot argument to the meeting.
The bright lamp lit the whole room.
We saw a bright star in the night sky.
The bright sun reflected on the snow.
She wore a bright yellow jacket.
The bright screen hurt my eyes.
A bright flash surprised everyone.
The bright paint looks fresh and new.
The bright flames rose above the wood.
There is a bright line on the horizon.
He turned on a bright ceiling light.
She has a bright idea for the project.
The child is bright and learns quickly.
We have a bright future if we work together.
He made a bright comment during the debate.
Her bright smile changed the mood in the room.
The plan gives a bright hope to the community.
He is bright despite his young age.
The team started the year with a bright ambition.
She offered a bright solution to the problem.
Their bright mood spread to others.
The room is dark without the lights.
The sky became dark before the storm.
We walked through a dark tunnel.
The forest looks dark at night.
He wore a dark coat to the meeting.
The paint dries to a dark blue color.
The street is dark after midnight.
The dark clouds covered the sun.
Her hair is dark and curly.
The kitchen stays dark in winter mornings.
He felt dark thoughts after the loss.
The story has a dark ending.
She kept a dark secret for years.
The team entered a dark period of failures.
His dark mood worried his friends.
The article describes a dark chapter of history.
They joked to hide a dark fear inside.
The city faced a dark future without support.
Her dark message shocked the audience.
He made a dark prediction about the economy.
